tool_description: Applies advanced denoising algorithms to medical images while preserving diagnostic features, supporting multiple filtering techniques optimized for different imaging modalities.

image_path.description: Path to the input medical image

filter_type.description: Denoising algorithm (gaussian, bilateral, non_local_means, wiener, total_variation)

strength.description: Denoising strength (0.1-2.0, higher values remove more noise)

preserve_edges.description: Whether to preserve edge information during denoising

output_path.description: Path where the denoised image will be saved

error_messages: Input image not found: Ensure image_path points to a valid image file.
Unsupported filter type: Use one of [gaussian, bilateral, non_local_means, wiener, total_variation].
Invalid strength value: strength must be between 0.1 and 2.0.
Output path invalid: Ensure output_path is a valid writable location.
Memory insufficient: Image too large for selected denoising algorithm.
usage: Provide image_path, filter_type, and output_path. Adjust strength to control denoising intensity and set preserve_edges to maintain diagnostic edge information.

noise_reduction_score.description: Quantitative measure of noise reduction achieved

edge_preservation_score.description: Score indicating how well edges were preserved

processing_time.description: Time taken for denoising in seconds

output_file_size.description: Size of output file in bytes
